name: Flip N' Fall
description:
“Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker meets both Super Monkey Ball and Super Mario Galaxy in a 3-D Platformer. Captain Cube must manipulate the stage environments and gravity itself to reach the end of each stage and stop the evil space shark, Andromegalodon.

CONTROLS

ESC - Pause/Menu

Tab - Tooltip Overlay

Q, E - Stage Rotation

W, A, S, D - Player Movement

Shift - Gravity Inversion

Space - Jump

F - Interact

C - Swap Camera Views

CREDIT
